definition: Foxconn Technology Group/abbr. of 富士康科技集團|富士康科技集团[Fu4 shi4 kang1 ke1 ji4 ji2 tuan2]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

pinyin: Fu4 shi4 kang1 Ke1 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

sentences.english: Foxconn did not go into the details surrounding Sun's death.
sentences.chinese: 富士康没有对孙的死亡做详细的解释。

sentences.english: It depends on how Foxconn and Apple work with the loc's government.
sentences.chinese: 其依赖于富士康和苹果公司如何与当地政府互助。

sentences.english: Even the plant's manhole covers are stamped 'Foxconn.'
sentences.chinese: 甚至园区的下水道井盖上也印有“富士康”字样。

sentences.english: But its fantastically successful business model seems to have run its course.
sentences.chinese: 但是富士康非常成功的企业模式似乎都是顺其自然的。

sentences.english: The printed circuit board is made by Foxconn Advanced Technology.
sentences.chinese: 印刷电路板由富士康领先科技制造。

sentences.english: This undoubtedly and in addition weighed the poise that the HengYang introduces Fuji Kang.
sentences.chinese: 这无疑又加重了衡阳引进富士康的砝码。

sentences.english: Mr. Ma’s sister quit shortly after her brother’s death.
sentences.chinese: 马向前的姐姐在他弟弟自杀之后不久就离开了富士康。

sentences.english: Foxconn is proposing to do it all (pardon the inevitable pun) in one great leap forward.
sentences.chinese: 富士康计划在下一步的跃进中做到这一切。

sentences.english: Both Foxconn and China's labor department should be held responsible for this.
sentences.chinese: 富士康和中国劳动部门应为此事负责。

sentences.english: Quanta, Foxconn and Inventec all declined to comment on specific clients.
sentences.chinese: 广达，富士康和英业达均拒绝就此事作任何评论。

sentences.english: Twelve falls in Foxconn this year banged shocks on the international society.
sentences.chinese: 富士康今年发生十二起坠楼事件，震惊了国际社会。

sentences.english: The public nature of Foxconn's labor problems could end up benefiting the company, enabling it to pass on the costs of its new worker-friendly initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 富士康劳工问题上升为公共话题将会减少公司的利润。

sentences.english: Go ahead: Cry for the folks at Foxconn.
sentences.chinese: 继续，为富士康的伙计哭哭吧。

sentences.english: FIH withdrew the suit in October, then refiled it days later.
sentences.chinese: 10月，富士康撤销了诉讼，但在几天后又重新起诉。

sentences.english: Foxconn's labor practices have been criticized in the past. Also from today's IDG News story
sentences.chinese: 过去富士康劳资做法已遭批评。

sentences.english: Forget about which Western techno toy makers are using Foxconn.
sentences.chinese: 忘记西方电子玩具制造商是怎样用富士康的吧。

definition: Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn

pinyin: Fu4 shi4 kang1 Ke1 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Guo "Terry" Taiming (1950-), prominent Taiwanese businessman, founder of Foxconn
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
to cut staff/to lay off employees
